title: FinOps Foundation Launches New FinOps for AI Certification
author: Alex Williams
description: The curriculum for the new credential, announced this week at FInOpsX in San Diego, will roll out over the next several months.
cntitle: FinOps 基金会推出新的 FinOps for AI 认证
cndescription: 在圣地亚哥的 FInOpsX 大会上宣布的这项新证书的课程将在未来几个月内推出。
